amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit offshore natural gas drilling.
amendment.purpose: An amendment number 1 by Peterson(PA) to insert language on page 50, line 3, after the period stating "The preceding sentence shall not apply with respect to natural gas offshore preleasing, leasing, and related activities beyond 25 miles from the coastline":.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 233 (Roll no. 552).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Peterson (PA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 233 (Roll no. 552).
